Subskills.name: Lamb of God
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to set monsters on fire causing them to spread flames while moving.

Subskills.name: Flame of the Heavens
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of heavenly fire.

Subskills.name: Essence of Heavens
Subskills.description: Unleash a heavenly orb scorching the ground below leaving behind a trail of burning flames.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Burn
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by heavenly fire.

Subskills.name: Heaven's Blessing
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of heavenly fire.

Subskills.name: Heavenly Smite
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Inner Ignition
Subskills.description: Chance to increase your arcane damage on hit for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Ascendant Flame
Subskills.description: Increases the size and tick frequency of heavenly fire over time.

Subskills.name: Shattering Flames
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Ethereal Burn
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Word of God
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of heavenly fire.

Subskills.name: Chain of Fire
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a chain of fire on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Righteous Path
Subskills.description: Leave behind a trail of heavenly fire for a short duration inflicting elemental break on hit. Heavenly Fire now has a cooldown.
